messages.content: ComfyUI-SVD is a custom node or plugin extension for ComfyUI, a GUI that uses a stable diffusion model to generate images and videos.
Is ComfyUI-SVD still relevant in light of the latest update?

No, ComfyUI-SVD is now considered redundant as Comfy has added official support for the ComfyUI-SVD's functionality. You can find more information on the official updates here: https://comfyanonymous.github.io/ComfyUI_examples/video/
